topic.title: Reporting Birth Information from a clinical setting to vital records - conformance rules

section.p:
The document definition captures the information represented on the US Facility Worksheet for the Live Birth Certificate, which is used to record and register the birth of a child. In the United States, registration of vital events is the responsibility of 57 vital records jurisdictions representing 50 states, 5 territories, Washington, DC and New York City. Vital statistics are reported to the National Center for Health Statistics, a Center within the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC). The experience of state and federal vital records officials has been drawn on for the contents of the document.
The collection of birth event data is required whether the birth takes place in a facility, at home (planned or unplanned), or en route to a facility.

ol.li:
Contains zero or one [0..1] @classCode="DOCCLIN" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
The code value indicates this is a clincial document.

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
The value indicates the included information refers to an existing document - as opposed to an intended one.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
The value provided indicates that the document is a live birth report.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] confidentialityCode, where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.25 Confidentiality)
An indication of the level of confidentiality with which the document needs to be managed.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime
The point in time the document was created at.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id
Provide the identifier assigned to the document by the healthcare provider acting as a custodian of the information.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] languageCode
The language used for recording information within the document.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] realmCode/@code="US" (CodeSystem: 1.0.3166.1 Country (ISO 3166-1))
The realm that the document is relevant for. This specification is a US realm product.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] title
A text title for the document.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] author
The author participation contains information about the person who authored the document.
This author Contains exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="AUT"
This author SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedAuthor
This assignedAuthor SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] id
An identifier for the author of the live birth report. Normally this is the certifying clinician.
This assignedAuthor Contains exactly one [1..1] assignedPerson, where its type is CDA Person

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] custodian
The custodian represents the organization that is in charge of maintaining the document. The custodian is the steward that is entrusted with the care of the document. Every CDA document has exactly one custodian.
This custodian SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="CST"
This custodian Contains exactly one [1..1] assignedCustodian, where its type is CDA Assigned Custodian

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] recordTarget
Information to identify the mother of the child.
This recordTarget SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="RCT"
This recordTarget SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] patientRole
This patientRole SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] @classCode="PAT"
This patientRole SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] addr
The current postal address for the mother.
This patientRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id
The medical record number assigned to the mother by the health care facility.
This patientRole Contains zero or one [0..1] patient
This patient SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] @classCode="PSN"
This patient SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] @determinerCode="INSTANCE"
This patient SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] name
The name of the mother.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Antenatal Testing and Surveillance Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.3)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Pregnancy History Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.xxx)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] History of Infection Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.xxx)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Newborn Delivery Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.6)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Labor and Delivery Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.5)

Contains zero or one [0..1] @classCode="DOCCLIN" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
The code value indicates this is a clincial document.

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
The value indicates the included information refers to an existing document - as opposed to an intended one.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] realmCode/@code="US" (CodeSystem: 1.0.3166.1 Country (ISO 3166-1))
The realm that the document is relevant for. This specification is a US realm product.
Contains exactly one [1..1] typeId with data type Infrastructure Root Type Id

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id
Provide the identifier assigned to the document by the healthcare provider acting as a custodian of the information.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
The value provided indicates that the document is a live birth report.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] title
A text title for the document.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime
The point in time the document was created at.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] confidentialityCode, where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.25 Confidentiality)
An indication of the level of confidentiality with which the document needs to be managed.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] languageCode
The language used for recording information within the document.
Contains exactly one [1..1] component, where its type is Component2

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] author
The author participation contains information about the person who authored the document.
This author Contains exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="AUT"
This author SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedAuthor
This assignedAuthor SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] id
An identifier for the author of the live birth report. Normally this is the certifying clinician.
This assignedAuthor Contains exactly one [1..1] assignedPerson, where its type is CDA Person

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] custodian
The custodian represents the organization that is in charge of maintaining the document. The custodian is the steward that is entrusted with the care of the document. Every CDA document has exactly one custodian.
This custodian SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="CST"
This custodian Contains exactly one [1..1] assignedCustodian, where its type is CDA Assigned Custodian

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] recordTarget
Information to identify the mother of the child.
This recordTarget SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="RCT"
This recordTarget SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] patientRole
This patientRole SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] @classCode="PAT"
This patientRole SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] addr
The current postal address for the mother.
This patientRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id
The medical record number assigned to the mother by the health care facility.
This patientRole Contains zero or one [0..1] patient
This patient SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] @classCode="PSN"
This patient SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] @determinerCode="INSTANCE"
This patient SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] name
The name of the mother.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Antenatal Testing and Surveillance Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.3)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Pregnancy History Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.xxx)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] History of Infection Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.xxx)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Newborn Delivery Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.6)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Labor and Delivery Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.5)
